CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 3 - Prohibition of torture (Article 3 - Degrading treatment) (Substantive aspect)
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant has been detained in various departments of correctional colony no . CARDINAL of GPE , GPE ( hereinafter “ GPE ” ) , since CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . NORP The applicant disposed of CARDINAL . square metres ( sq.m . ) of personal space during different periods of his detention .
